name: _id
description: An opaque unique identifier. Round number is kept in the `round` field.

name: blockWasProposed
description: True if a block was proposed and executed in this round.

name: epoch
description: The epoch the round belongs to.

name: shardId
description: The shard the round belongs to.

name: signersIndexes
description: An array that contains the indices of the validators that should sign the block from this round.
